title: OneNutS
author: OneNutS
created_time: March 19, 2023, 06:05:32 PMLast edit: May 01, 2023, 04:09:01 AM by OneNutS
content: .RESSOURCES.                        More details on the Website● Bounty Campaign Round 1 Dates: March 20 - May 14  lasts for 8 weeks .● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 2 months after the end of the Bounty Campaign.● Weekly stakes! Do tasks every week, make reports every week, and get stakes every week!● Tokens will be distributed to participants within 2 months after the end of the Bounty Campaign in the BSC ( bep 20 ) wallet ● Join Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) on social media:- Twitter- Telegram Community - Telegram Channel- Medium- Discord- Linkedin- YouTube● Perform tasks throughout the week! Tasks completed in one day-spam.●  You will receive stakes for performing certain actions, after the end of the bounty campaign, the stakes will be converted into tokens, according to the formula (total number of tokens/total number of stakes)*number of your stakes.● Please read the terms and conditions carefully. For non-compliance, even minor, you will not receive stakes or will be excluded from the bounty program.● Use of multi-accounts, spam, bots and other is strictly forbidden, all attempts will be banned.● Bounty managers reserve the right to change the conditions of the bounty campaign. ● Make reports every week. DO NOT QUOTE YOUR OLD REPORT🙏!● Please, read the terms carefully. For non-compliance with requirements, you will not get stakes or be excluded from the bounty program.● Bounty Manager credits Spreadsheets with stakes once a week. Follow all updates in this thread and Telegram chats: Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) Bounty , Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) Chat, Aladdin Center●  Format for proof of authentication post:Code: Proof of authentication:- BSC ( bep 20 ) wallet address:- ETH (erc 20) wallet address:- Telegram Username:- Campaigns applied for:Bounty campaign reward pool:  $ 30 000 worth $BEAM  tokens will be distributed through this bounty campaign. Rewards dislocation:● Video:  20%● Article: 20%● Twitter : 25%● Discord: 25%● Reserve fund - 10%Report dates:●  Week 1 (20/03-26/03)●  Week 2 (27/03 - 02/03)●  Week 3 (03/04 - 09/04)●  Week 4 (10/04-16/04)●  Week 5 (17/04-23/04)●  Week 6 (24/04 - 30/04)Rewards:  ● Excellent: 4 stakes (High quality video and >4000 subscribers)● High: 3 stakes (Good quality video and >2000 subscribers )● Good: 2 stake (Average quality video and >1000 subscribers)● Average: 1 stake (Average quality video and >400 subscribers)Rules:  ● Join Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) on social media:- Twitter- Telegram Community - Telegram Channel- Medium- Discord- Linkedin- YouTube● Each participant can send:                                             - YouTube - 8 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )                                            - Tiktok - 8 videos ( No more than 1 video a week )● Participant's account should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the video campaign and have at least 300 subscribers.● The video description must include 70+ words of original text about the company Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad )● Please note, if the video has 0 views it will be rated at 0 stakes!● Content topics: Information can be used fromSocial networks BeamPad WhitePaper  Use information about Airdrop and use hashtags: #Tokenixe #nft #realestate #investing #blockchain ● Only original video content will be accepted. Copy from the project website, YouTube channels or from others' work will be rejected.● Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered.● High engagements but poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality.● Videos should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● All videos need to have a link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these videos as marketing materials.● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:  1.  Join Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) on social media:- Twitter- Telegram Community - Telegram Channel- Medium- Discord- Linkedin- YouTube3. Write a good video about Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad )  project4. Post it on your website, Tiktok, YouTube5. Submit it here:  Rewards:● Excellent: 4 stakes● High: 3 stakes● Good: 2 stakes● Average: 1 stakeYou can use social media for information: - Twitter- Telegram Community - Telegram Channel- Medium- Discord- Linkedin- YouTubeRules:● Each participant can write 8 original  article only ( No more than 1 per week )● Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words.● Views and comments at least 10 likes/comments/upvotes or 100 claps would be taken note of.● Participant's forum accounts should be at least 3 months old prior to participating in the article campaign.● Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: 4chan.org , Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, Medium and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible.Other high ranked blogs may be accepted.● In the description of a Article, you have to write 70+ words of original text about the company https://www.tokenixe.com/● Content topics:Information can be used fromSocial networks Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) WhitePaper  Use information about Airdrop and use hashtags: #Tokenixe #nft #realestate #investing #blockchain● Only quality and original content will be accepted. Articles should never be removed. Removal/deletion will result in disqualification.● Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project, link to the Proof of Authentication, project's website, Medium page, Twitter page, Telegram group, YouTube channel or any other social media.● Please provide enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure authenticity. This will be verified!● By joining this program, all participants accept that the project's team can use all these articles as marketing materials● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) Bounty, Aladdin CenterHow to join:1.  Join Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) on social media:- Twitter- Telegram Community - Telegram Channel- Medium- Discord- Linkedin- YouTube2. Write a good article about Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad )  project3. Post it on your website, 4chan.org, Medium, LinkedIn, Steemit, Reddit, BitcoinTalk, etc.:4. Submit it here:  Rewards:● 300 to 1000 followers: 1 stake, per one tweet or retweet● 1001 to 3000 followers: 2 stakes, per one tweet or retweet● 3001 - 6000 followers: 3 stakes, per one tweet or retweet● 6001 - 12000 followers: 4 stakes per one tweet or retweet● 12000+ followers: 5 stakes per one tweet or retweetRules:● Must have at least 300 followers and make privacy settings open for your page.● Follow and like the official Twitter account● Participants have to make 10 new tweets and 10 retweets per week (maximum 2 tweet and 2 retweet per day).● Like a post when you make a repost. Use information from official social networks. ● Participants must use   #Tokenixe #nft #realestate #investing #blockchain hashtags in every retweet and tweet.● DO NOT SPAM IN THE OFFICIAL PAGES OF THE PROJECT ! ● Multiple accounts registrations are not allowed, all related accounts will be checked and deleted● Questions regarding Bounty Campaign asked in the  Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) Bounty, Aladdin Center● Please, post all the links to your work in this thread at the end of every week as a new post. Do not quote or edit your previous week report.How to join:1. Fill out the registration form here:  2. Submit your weekly activity log in this thread using the format below: Code:● Twitter Report ●- Week, Data: …. …- Twitter Profile:- Retweet Link #1:...- Retweet Link #2:...- Retweet Link #3:...- Retweet Link #4:.........- Retweet Link #10:...- Tweet Link#1:...- Tweet Link#2:...- Tweet Link #3:...- Tweet Link #4:...- Tweet Link #10:.......                            ❌⚠️Stop Discord Campaign⚠️❌🚫🚫🚫The team is not happy with your work, which in most looks like spam! We are stopping this campaign! 🚫⛔️•••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••Tokens intended for rewarding bounty campaign participants cannot be held in escrow because they have not yet been published.A smart contract will be published in the coming days. To ensure transparency, the team Tokenixe ( formerly BeamPad ) will manage the distribution of these tokens itself.
